83722.summary: Some customers in the Queens Park area of New Westminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83722.title: Oct 11 - New Westminster (Queens Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

83736.title: Oct 12 - Winnipeg (Dufferin) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
